question: how many african-american head coaches in the nfl
context: Currently, 5 of the 32 head coaches in the NFL are African-American, with 1 additional head coach who is Hispanic. Recently, legal scholars have advocated for extending the Rooney Rule to college football, where the number of minority head coaches hovers around 6%, which is significantly lower than the 12.6% of the total US population which is African-American.
